mapper.update: update member_credential set member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_id = #{loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where member_credential_id = #{memberCredentialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select member_credential_id, member_id, login_id, password, created_at, updated_at from member_credential
